PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-03632021-04-30,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ESDC,  TB
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectCanada Emergency Response Benefit and Employment Insurance Emergency Response Benefit Remission Order
PrecisCANADA EMERGENCY RESPONSE BENEFIT (CERB) AND EMPLOYMENT INSURANCE EMERGENCY RESPONSE BENEFIT (EI-ERB) REMISSION ORDER in order remit the debts of self-employed individuals who were not eligible for but received the CERB or EI-ERB.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2021-0019 Publication Date: 2021-05-12
AttachmentsAttachment
